file_name: SPIENERGYCO,LTD_07_10_2014-EX-10-Cooperation Agreement of 50MWp Photovoltaic Grid-connected Power Generation Project in Yangqiao of~1.txt

perturbation.original_text: Party A: People's Government of Fenyi County Party B: Xinyu Xinwei New Energy Co., Ltd.
perturbation.changed_text: The Local Authority: People's Government of Fenyi County The Investor: Xinyu Xinwei New Energy Co., Ltd.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'Party A' and 'Party B' are replaced with 'The Local Authority' and 'The Investor,' respectively, but these are used inconsistently throughout the document. This creates confusion about which entity each clause refers to, potentially leading to disputes over obligations.

perturbation.original_text: Party A supports and guarantees the project construction and development of Party B, and will provide the most preferential policies and all- round service in the aspects of preliminary work, construction and grid-connected of the project, and actively coordinate relevant departments and units to help Party B accelerate project construction progress. Party B will give full play to the advantages in funds, talents, technologies, and etc. to accelerate the preliminary work progress of the project, ensure the early commencement of the project and produce benefits upon early completion.
perturbation.changed_text: The Local Authority supports the project construction. The Investor will utilize resources to accelerate the project's preliminary work.
perturbation.explanation: Here, 'Party A' is changed to 'The Local Authority', and 'Party B' to 'The Investor'. The original text guarantees preferential policies, while the changed text removes this commitment, only expressing support. Also, the change dilutes Party B's/The Investor's obligations, stating they 'will utilize resources' instead of 'give full play to advantages' and 'ensure early commencement', creating conflicting levels of commitment.

perturbation.original_text: Party B promises that land nature will not be changed for building large-scale PV grid-connected power generation project in the plot; comprehensive development will be carried out according to relevant national stipulations, such commercial crops will be interplanted as agriculture and forestry as well as medicinal materials; local employees will enjoy the priority to be employed; local building materials will be adopted and relevant expenses will be paid on schedule.
perturbation.changed_text: The Investor ensures that land use complies with regulations for large-scale energy projects. Comprehensive development should be conducted to maximize agricultural output, and preference shall be given to local laborers and materials, pending budgetary approval.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Party B' is now 'The Investor.' The commitment to interplant commercial crops is weakened to a suggestion to 'maximize agricultural output.' The guaranteed 'priority' for local employees and materials is made conditional on 'budgetary approval,' which contradicts the previous absolute promise and makes the obligations of the Investor less certain. This creates an internal contradiction and uncertainty about enforcement.
